title: Napoleon

People/Napoleon I, Emperor of the French, 1769-1821
History/Napoleon I, Emperor of the French, 1769-1821
description: Acclaimed as the most accurate depiction of the life and times of Napoleon this film depicts the early beginnings, the famed love saga with Josephine, and the undisputable achievements of history's most colourful conqueror. Filmed on location at the actual historical sites of Versailles, Fountainbleau and the Chateau of Malmaison. The star-studded cast features Orson Welles and Yves Montand.
